```{r}
install.packages('dplyr')
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
head(mtcars)
```

```{r}
filter_cars=filter(mtcars,mpg>20,cyl==6)
filter_cars
```

```{r}
cars_df=as.data.frame(mtcars)
cars_df
```

```{r}
new_cars_df=cars_df[order(cars_df$cyl,cars_df$wt),]
new_cars_df
```


```{r}

```

```{r}
mtcars$Performance=mtcars$hp/mtcars$wt
mtcars
```

```{r}
mean_hp_val=mtcars%>% 
  filter(cyl==6)%>%
  summarise(
  mean_mt_cars_hp_val=mean(hp)
  )
```
